channel.title: Possible half-life 3 reference in DOTA2 blog
channel.description:
Third image down. 3 LAMBDAS :jizz:
[url]https://blog.dota2.com/2012/06/did-you-see-that-kill/[/url]
Then again, maybe it's a clan thing with custom emblems.

Adidas sneakers

I see what you did there

Read full topic
item.source: Possible half-life 3 reference in DOTA2 blog

item.title: Possible half-life 3 reference in DOTA2 blog
item.dc:creator: Surplus
item.description:
Bolteh:

Half-Life is Valve’s franchise. Half-Life made Valve big. Obviously they’re going to put Half-Life references in everything they do.

Also, I count lambda 4 times (3x symbol, once as a word)

OH MY FUCKING GOD VALVE IS SKIPPING EPISODE 3 OR HL3 AND ARE JUMPING STRAIGHT TO HL4!!!

Unless you count bot names I don’t see any HL references in tf2 or CS:GO and the reference made to half life in l4d2 with the crowbar is subtle. This is blatant, not just a nod to their successful franchise. This is trying to be them trying to be assholes.

Read full topic
item.source: Possible half-life 3 reference in DOTA2 blog

It was obviously meant to be a Revenge of The Nerds reference.

item.source: Possible half-life 3 reference in DOTA2 blog

item.title: Possible half-life 3 reference in DOTA2 blog
item.dc:creator: DiePoente
item.description:
Duh, you guys always get your hopes high at every little possible HL reference, and then you get shitmad at Valve when nothing happens.

You should start not believing in everything, since Valve said that they will do it on their own way, to announce the next HL game and I have a feel that it will be different to the previous announcements.

Read full topic

item.title: Possible half-life 3 reference in DOTA2 blog
item.dc:creator: OrderOfDagon
item.description:
User: “Hey, let me point out that some people look for things that aren’t there.”

30 Following Users: “Let me point that out, too. Wait, why stop there? Let’s make hundreds of jokes that aren’t funny about the topic.”

Oops – thinking out loud.

item.title: Possible half-life 3 reference in DOTA2 blog
item.dc:creator: CygNuS
item.description:
Bolteh:

It’s hilarious how people see HL3 in everything Valve does.

Gabe is seen in a supermarket wearing a pair of Adidas sneakers = Vale trolling us

Some female Valve worker is pregnant of triplets = Valve trolling us

Doug is diagnosed with cancer and has 3 months to live = Valve trolling us

You people are fairly sad, really.

Perhaps, but in THIS case, do you honestly think they named that screenshot LambdaLambdaLambda by accident??
Also, what SURPLUS_NiNjA said.

Read full topic
item.source: Possible half-life 3 reference in DOTA2 blog

item.title: Possible half-life 3 reference in DOTA2 blog
item.dc:creator: Surplus
item.description:
Bolteh:

It’s hilarious how people see HL3 in everything Valve does.

Gabe is seen in a supermarket wearing a pair of Adidas sneakers = Vale trolling us

Some female Valve worker is pregnant of triplets = Valve trolling us

Doug is diagnosed with cancer and has 3 months to live = Valve trolling us

You people are fairly sad, really.

Completely unrelated IPs but putting them together. Honestly it isn’t often any studio does things like this. Valve does it to be a bunch of assholes.

I don’t think its a hint or something towards HL3 or valve trolling us. Valve is just being a bunch of pricks. “Hey you guys want to hear about your favorite game series? Well we aren’t going to talk about it for legitimate reasons”. I can dig that, but then shit like this is just saying “Hey fuck you”.

Read full topic

item.title: Possible half-life 3 reference in DOTA2 blog
item.dc:creator: CygNuS
item.description:
LambdaLambdaLambda.
Clear example of Valve trolling us with HL3 indeed.

IMHO, their trolling stopped being funny since they themselves realized that the episodic system failed.
Or maybe it’s just me…

That doesn’t take away from the fact that Half Life 3 will be awesome and Valve is still one of the most awesome developers out there.

Read full topic
